items: A light source (Candle, Candle Lantern, Bullsye Lantern, Bruma torch)
req.name: Items

items: Bruma torch (Can't be extinguish by traps)
req.name: Recommended

description: Talk to the High Priest in Sophanem.
Talk to Jex.

3.step: Climb down the nearby ladder, then the trapdoor.
3.subtitle: Sophanem dungeon

description: Climb down the nearby ladder
Climb down the trapdoor.

4.step: Follow the path through the dungeon (shown below).

description: Floor trap: Avoid using agility (14-17 damage).
Wall trap: Avoid using Thieving (14-17 damage).
Crusher: Avoid using the mini-map to mover (8 damage)
Sand pits: Avoid by walking around (Scarab swarm will appear).
Scarab trap: Avoid standing directly on one (Beware: Drops player to the LOWER LEVEL!)
Scarab traps = Lower Level
Immediately, light your candle to prevent continuous damage!
(Beware: This is a multi-combat area where you can take massive amount of damage quickly. Either pray mage/range/melee and climb up one of the ladders to escape!)
Climb down the ladders at the end of the red path.

5.step: Search Kaleef's body and read the parchment.

description: Search Kaleef's body.
Read the parchment.
Talk to Maisa.
Talk to Osman.

8.step: Talk Osman outside the gates of Sophanem. (Chat 3)

description: Talk Osman outside the gates of Sophanem.

9.step: Follow the path through the dungeon again (shown below).
9.subtitle: Giant scarab (level 191)

description: Floor trap: Avoid using agility (14-17 damage).
Wall trap: Avoid using Thieving (14-17 damage).
Crusher: Avoid using the mini-map to mover (8 damage)
Sand pits: Avoid by walking around (Scarab swarm will appear).
Scarab trap: Avoid standing directly on one (Beware: Drops player to the LOWER LEVEL!)
Scarab traps = Lower Level
Immediately, light your candle to prevent continuous damage!
(Beware: This is a multi-combat area where you can take massive amount of damage quickly. Either pray mage/range/melee and climb up one of the ladders to escape!)
Climb down the ladders at the end of the red path.
(BEWARE: If you die all items lost will vanish!)
It summons level 68 Locust riders and Scarab mages to aid it in battle. Its max hit is 20 and very poisonous with the poison damage starting at 9.
Finish talking to Osman then pick-up Keris.
Talk to the High priest.
